pages.text: Casineria is a small tetrapod from the Carboniferous period, it was seen as a transitional fossil between amphibian and reptile. Its small size would have given it an advantage in hunting invertebrates.
$(l)Eats:$() Bug Meat$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Bug Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Moss/Log Eggs$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
